description: SSH operations and remote command execution

Open Connection.description: Opens a new SSH connection to the given host and port
Open Connection.security_warning: WARNING:  Use key-based authentication instead of passwords for production

Get Connections.description: Returns information about all open connections

Login.description: Logs into the SSH server with the given username and password
Login.security_warning: WARNING:  Avoid hardcoding credentials in test scripts

Login With Public Key.description: Logs into the SSH server using key-based authentication

Set Client Configuration.description: Updates configuration values for current SSH connection

Execute Command.description: Executes command in a new shell on the remote machine
Execute Command.security_warning: WARNING:  Sanitize commands to prevent injection attacks

Start Command.description: Starts executing command on the remote machine in background

Read Command Output.description: Returns output from the started command

Write.description: Writes the given text to the server

Write Bare.description: Writes the given text to the server without appending newline

Read.description: Consumes and returns everything available on the server output

Read Until.description: Consumes and returns the server output until expected text is encountered

Read Until Prompt.description: Consumes and returns the server output until prompt is found

Read Until Regexp.description: Consumes and returns the server output until regexp is found

Write Until Expected Output.description: Writes the given text repeatedly until expected output is found

Put File.description: Copies files from local machine to remote machine
Put File.security_warning: WARNING:  Validate destination paths and file permissions

Put Directory.description: Copies directories from local machine to remote machine

Get File.description: Copies files from remote machine to local machine
Get File.security_warning: WARNING:  Validate file paths to prevent directory traversal

Get Directory.description: Copies directories from remote machine to local machine

List Directory.description: Returns and logs items in the remote path, optionally filtered by pattern

List Files In Directory.description: Returns files in the remote path, optionally filtered by pattern

List Directories In Directory.description: Returns directories in the remote path, optionally filtered by pattern

File Should Exist.description: Fails if the given path does not point to an existing file

File Should Not Exist.description: Fails if the given path points to an existing file

Directory Should Exist.description: Fails if the given path does not point to an existing directory

Directory Should Not Exist.description: Fails if the given path points to an existing directory

Create File.description: Creates a file with the given content to the specified path

Create Directory.description: Creates a directory to the specified path

Remove File.description: Removes a file from the remote machine

Remove Directory.description: Removes a directory from the remote machine

Get File Size.description: Returns the size of the file on the remote machine

Get File Permissions.description: Returns the permissions of the file on the remote machine

Set File Permissions.description: Sets the permissions of the file on the remote machine

Enable Ssh Logging.description: Enables logging of SSH traffic to the given file
